entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Nordegg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 p.m. MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain or wet snow beginning this evening then changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
